titles.title: Undetectable Firearms Reauthorization Act of 2013
A bill to reauthorize the Undetectable Firearms Act of 1988 for 1 year.

action.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 252.

bill.summary: 11/21/2013--Introduced. Undetectable Firearms Reauthorization Act of 2013 - Extends the Undetectable Firearms Act of 1988 for one year (the Act prohibits the manufacture or possession of firearms that are not detectable by the types of x-ray machines commonly used at airports).
